website_summaries.verdict: A classic pizza cutter with a handle that's designed to feel secure and stable in the hand.
pros: We like this model's contoured handle and textured anti-skid component that provides a secure grip
Has a sharp stainless steel blade and is dishwasher safe
Some owners brag about how well it works for cutting vegetables as well as pizza
cons: Wheels on some cutters were wobbly, making it difficult to cut straight or even slices

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, durable, easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: The pizza cutter came with a sharp blade, does it's job great. Easy to wash, which is a plus. Easy to hold, so no accidents expected. The packaging is good. Just make sure you unbox it carefully - the blade is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: WOBBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, this cutter wobbles 7/16" (I measured). This does not look to be defective, but more a design aspect (flaw). Not only will a wobble like this not cut straight, but can also be dangerous due to lack of control, and will inevitably lead to it wearing out early as the angles cause extra stress on it. Will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Size to Small for a full size pizza
customer_reviews.text: The wheel size to cut the pizza is just 3 inches, which is to small to cut a normal size pizza. I guess if its a personal/individual size pizza it might be okay. I replaced with a wheel cutter size of 4 inches, which 1 inch to most of us is no big deal...but it is...to since I used it with great difficulty to cut my pizza I will not return it....waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: 19th Puka

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKE THIS KNIFE , IT IS VERY SHARP SO BE CAREFUL . I USED IT THE OTHER NIGHT TO SLICE A TRI-TIP AND IT JUST GLIDES THROUGH THE MEAT LIKE NOTHING , THE MEAT WAS PERFECT , NICE THIN SLICES . IT DOES NOT MATTER HOW YOU WANT IT CUT THIS IS THE KNIFE THAT YOU NEED TO DO THE JOB . I RECOMMEND TO ANYONE LOOKING TO BUY A PERFECT KNIFE AND IT IS THE ONLY ONE TO SLICE THINGS IN THE KITCHEN THAT YOU WILL EVER NEED. THUMBS UP.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tachiera

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully weighted Chef's knife
customer_reviews.text: wow what a great product! From initial packaging you can tell this is a well thought out product manufactured to top spec. Beautifully presented and branded. The handle is unique non slip design and perfectly weighted so the knife is well balanced. Makes for efficient cutting action now that I've used it for a few days. Can't judge a knife by its sharpness alone is all about the weight and this is near perfect at such a great price. We've used more expensive knives in the kitchen and have to say this easily matches those. Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miner

customer_reviews.title: starsThis is now the best night we Own
customer_reviews.text: The knife surpassed all of my expectations. it was super Sharp and sliced through everything from vegetables to chicken and meat like as if it was a hot knife through butter. The cover is definitely needed for something as sharp as this in the cutlery drawer. The handle is also very nice premium black finish seamlessly moulding into the steel of the knife it's quite pleasing to look at and very nice balanced weight when using full stop the box it came with also makes it a very ideal gift with premium packaging and compartments cut out for the knife for the information booklet and for the cover of The Knife
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product & Service
customer_reviews.text: I must say I was a little skeptical when I ordered the knife, but when it arrived, well you'd have thought I paid three times the amount. The presentation, packaging and guard was top drawer. There was a slight flat on my blade which caught my eye, so I feed back this although I wasn't too bothered. However, next thing I know I was thanked for my feedback by Waleed the owner who was very quick to dispatch another. If they continue to offer this level of service with quality products then I can see them going places. So nice to find a business that cares, they are rare these days!
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Vader Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this pizza cutter feels in my hand. It is sharp and cuts through all types of pizza with no problem. Easy to clean also. It is constructed well with good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Candace K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product with sturdy stainless steel blade. It’s easy to hold and is lightweight . It is soft and fits the palm perfectly making it easier to cut through the hot pizza. Easily fits into my drawer and is dishwasher safe !
customer_reviews.author: Sumu

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Useful Pizza Cutter
customer_reviews.text: I was looking specifically for a stainless steel pizza cutter so decided to order this one and I am very satisfied with the purchase! I have already used this 3-4 times so far, it has a nice grip to hold onto, very sharp, build quality looks great and very easy to wash as well. Cant ask for a better price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Karan Palekar

customer_reviews.title: Slice it up
customer_reviews.text: Judge it yourself by looking at the pictures. High quality for less. I love the wood handle. It fits perfectly in my hand. The most important part is it is sharp and easy to cut, slice the meat. Satisfied with my purchase. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SharkBytes

customer_reviews.title: High quality and it is very sharp!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get a pizza cut for a long time and finally decided to give it a try. It is really easy to control it. What surprised me was very easy to clean. Although I wouldn’t mind paying a little extra if it comes with a knife cover, because it is very sharp and in fact I have to cover it using paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comes sharp, ready to use after cleaning for the first time of course. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah’s Quick Opinions

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and feels chef
customer_reviews.text: First thing this is very steady and sturdy knife which is very sharp . I wish it has small grip kinda in the wooden grip . Heavy as well the knife is . If you are a pro chef you ll definitely like it .
customer_reviews.author: Jayaraja Jayaraman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Perfect size and weight and cuts well. Sharp appearance as well.
customer_reviews.author: mAtt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, feels good in your hand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's got some weight to it and feels good in your hand. Sturdy. Definitely will buy another! Cuts good. Cleans good.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great cutter. Nice heavy feel. I prefer thin crust but this cutter will easily work with thick ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Average pizza cutter... Not as sharp as I hoped so you have to put some muscle into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Antonico

customer_reviews.title: Not just for pizza
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through more than pizza. I love this kitchen tool
customer_reviews.author: alejandro bedoya

customer_reviews.title: Superb! Great Knife and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: "I do a lot of cooking and have bought a LOT of knives over the years. This is right up there with one of my best buys. Super impressed with the quality and it comes in a really nice presentation box and instructions to how to look after it. I'm going to buy one for my mum for Xmas now! Hopefully she doesn't read Amazon reviews :o)"
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ignacio Espiñeira

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Slicer
customer_reviews.text: Cuts pizza slices cleanly and in one stroke. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenReader

customer_reviews.title: Must-have tool if you bake at home
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to make raviolis, but i also use it for pie dough and flaked pastry. (In case you are wondering, it is definitely too small to be used for pizzas) The dual cutters have the benefit of providing two tools in one, which is a big plus if you're a kitchen gadget hoarder like me. The handle is nice and grip comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good pizza cut feels good in your hand nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin M. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite knife. The handle is angled nicely for chopping without having to put too much effort in it. Nice "wooden" look without having to be worried about putting it in the dishwasher. The serated edged keeps food pieces from continually sticking to the knife.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: If you want one good value, high quality knife, pick this one.
customer_reviews.text: If you're young, broke, and cook often enough to want one decent quality knife in your kitchen, this is it. No regrets buying this at all. I've had it for about a month now and use it almost every day. It's such a relief from my crummy knife-block chef's knives. This is my baby and I hope it lasts me for many years.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Pizza Accurately
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice cutter. Cuts as needed. The handle is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaushila

customer_reviews.title: Loose
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of this! Very sleek. However, it is pretty loose so not super easy to control and have a hard time getting a straight cut bc of this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, balance and sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, balance and sharp! No need to change to different knives while preparing meals. One knife to cut the onion, then one to cut the tomato because the onion knife won't cut the tomato... This will be the go to knife!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Pizzas can’t cut themselves
customer_reviews.text: I like pizzas, but annoyingly I can’t fit a whole one in my mouth without cutting it. That’s where this little gadget comes in, and it’s never met a pizza that it couldn’t cut through
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: After 2 washings, the black rubber gripper fell off. It sort of snaps back into place, just be careful in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Foulkes

customer_reviews.title: The wheel is large and the handle is easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this. The wheel is large and the handle is easy to work with. Cut like a breeze without being dangerous for anyone, children included.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: broke easily
customer_reviews.text: looked solidly made, broke the first time it was used. disappointing
customer_reviews.author: christine visnaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to clean, doesn't have a flimsy holder.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Spend some dough on this dough cutter!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through homemade pizza easily and cleans up nicely. No complaints whatsoever. I find OXO products to be well crafted and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased the pizza cutter, very good product, no more using knives for cutting pizza.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: First purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like it is easy to hold . Sturdy product
customer_reviews.author: LInda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pizza cutter. The blade does not wobble back and forth like our old one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.text: We use these things so often... I’ve broken three of them. This one? Pretty much the bomb. Pretty stainless steel. Super sharp. Decent size so it handled well. Super sturdy. Great pizza cutter.
customer_reviews.author: J Ro***

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks great, too
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed in how simple this was designed but how effective it was. Not only does this work well on pizzas, but it's great for thin or smaller pastries, cakes, breads and so on. The blade is much sharper than it looks, so do be careful when you're using this or watch your children when they're using this. The grip is made to fit in the hand well without sipping, so it's easy to use in case of oil or a bit of grease being on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to cut pizza and other things in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Have been happy with this cutter for use in the kitchen. Performs well in cutting pizza on the stone or on foil. It ids also handy when using it in making homemade noodles or pasta. The handle and grip have a nice feel to them and it washes nicely in the dishwasher. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable knife. Fits great in my hand and has a nice angle. The knife came out plenty sharp. It came in a nice box for storing it in. I was impressed with the overall look and feel of the knife. I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Cuts pizza well and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I had a pizza cutter that would hold water when ran through the dishwasher so I was looking for one with a sleek handle that wouldn't fall apart. This pizza cutter was exactly what I was looking for, and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Houston

customer_reviews.title: Pizza cutter is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pizza cutter. Just what we were looking for and works well. My husband hates the flimsy plastic roller type, so I thought this might work and it did the job. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: KimMieNo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp blade
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blade and makes straight cuts. I am impressed by the quality. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana P

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very high Quality , very sharp , this is the best Knife I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for chopping my vegetables
customer_reviews.text: A quality full tang chef's knife. Has a nice wooden handle. The blade is nice and sharp
customer_reviews.author: ronald j gamache jr

product_meta.title: Pizza Cutter Wheel,JmeGe Kitchen Stainless Steel Pizza Cutter with Ergonomic Anti-Slip Grip Handle
product_meta.description:
Material Type:Stainless Steel

Whether it's for yourself or the entire family, you can rely on the JmeGe Pizza Slicer to deliver clean cut pizza slices to your plate. 
The durable 4-inch stainless steel cutting wheel can easily cut through any type of crust in one run. 
An ergonomically designed grip also angles with the cutting wheel and provides a firm non-slip grip when cutting your pizzas. 
This Pizza slicer is machine washable,so there’s no need for messy clean up.

Features: 
The 170°wide angle enables wider view with more possibilities 
Dimensions:2.5-inch diameter blade 
Can be used to cut pizza,lasagna,fudge,among other foods 
Stainless steel blade with durable plastic handle 
Professional quality 
Dishwasher safe 
Sturdy,balanced,comfortable in the hand

Specifications: 
Material:zinc alloy + S/S 
Containment:7.4 inch pizza cutter 
Weight:126g/4.44oz 
Package size: 225*100*25mm

Package Included: 
1x Pizza cutter
feature_bullets: 100% time saving and cost effective product - pizza is delicious, but cutting It using a knife is a Nightmare. Unless you want to have a mess, use JmeGe best selling pizza wheel to serve your loved ones with the best pizzas in the world. We have made pizza cutting efficient for you. It is worth very dollar you spend on this!
Crucial tool - pizza cutter is a necessary tool for slicing through dough and crust easily. Jmege stainless steel pizza cutter is used by Home cooks and professional chefs across the globe.

Cut all your extra large pizzas in style - be it BBQ meet or vegetables, mushrooms or pineapples or Extra cheese for the topping, be it a thin crust, Thick crust or a stuffed crust, regardless the size of your pizza, if you have this tool handy in your hand, you will be able to slice it in seconds!

Hard and steady design - the sturdy ergonomic design is what distinguishes our high quality pizza cutter from the similar products. The long handle will help you to guide the wheel smoothly and swiftly leaving perfectly shaped pizza slices behind. The solid grip makes it easier to cut even pieces.

User-friendly - the sophisticated pizza wheel comes with an added layer of protection - the finger guard. No more injuries during your War with the knife and pizza. Cuts smoothly and stylishly across any topping, size or thickness. It is also extremely easy to clean. All you have to do is place it in the dishwasher!
